name: Color War
description:
Help your ship to get the maximum red circles, you just have to take care to crush the colors that approximate your ship, your ship alone to guide the red circles.

Sounds simple right? ... THEN TRY MAKE AN EXCELLENT SCORE!

In this game I recommend you to have good peripheral vision, if you have not, do not worry, you will get it!

14/10/2014 Implemented new system of combos, if you get the same color keep removing the score is multiplied by the factor of combos.

CONTACT
